commandtracker

Class Command

  • java.lang.Object
    • commandtracker.Command
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICommand, ICommandBehaviour

    public class Command
extends java.lang.Object
implements ICommand
    Concrete implementation of the ICommand interface, wraps an ICommandBehaviour and ads functionality to track its status as executed or undone.

      java.lang.Boolean setExecuted(java.lang.Boolean flag)
      Accessor to set the boolean flag which indicates if this command has been executed
      java.lang.String undoCommand()
      Reverses the command behaviour cancelling its effects
